name: Keya Wakpala Gardens
address: Mission, SD (specific street address not readily available)
description: A 1-acre agricultural nonprofit organization focused on producing vegetables, eggs, and honey, distributing them locally and teaching community members how to become producers
services: American-Indian-owned Garden education in South-Dakota consultation

name: Medicine Root Garden Program (Oyate Teca Project)
address: Pine Ridge Indian Reservation, SD (specific street address not readily available)
description: This program trains and assists individuals in growing their own food, with a mission to teach people how to feed themselves. In 2023, it harvested and distributed 41,752 pounds of fresh produce
services: American-Indian-owned Garden education in South-Dakota consultation

name: Sicangu Community Development Corporation (CDC) Food Sovereignty Initiative
address: Rosebud Indian Reservation, South Dakota (specific street address not readily available)
description: This initiative focuses on food sovereignty, with projects like the Keya Wakpala Garden connecting tribal members with the land and food. It aims to empower individuals to know how to feed themselves and their families
services: American-Indian-owned Garden education in South-Dakota consultation

name: Native American Heritage Association (NAHA)
description: While primarily focused on providing food, clothing, and heating assistance to Native American families on reservations in South Dakota, NAHA also engages in self-help initiatives
services: American-Indian-owned Garden education in South-Dakota consultation

name: One Spirit
address: Pine Ridge Reservation, South Dakota (specific street address not readily available)
description: This organization supports the Lakota people of Pine Ridge Reservation with programs promoting self-sufficiency, economic development, and educational opportunities. They also have initiatives related to food pantries and distribution
services: American-Indian-owned Garden education in South-Dakota consultation

name: South Dakota State University (SDSU) Extension - Native American Gardens
address: Various locations across South Dakota, associated with SDSU Extension offices
description: SDSU Extension provides resources and information on Native American community garden projects throughout South Dakota, offering guidance on starting and maintaining these initiatives

name: Lakota Friends Circle
address: Sioux Indian Reservations in South Dakota (specific street address not readily available)
description: This volunteer organization supports projects initiated by Lakota and Dakota community members on Sioux Indian Reservations, including support for education and food security

name: Tatanka Rez Tourz
address: Pine Ridge Indian Reservation, SD (specific street address not readily available)
description: Touted as the only Native American-owned tour company in South Dakota, run by a father-daughter duo on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation. They also hosted training for prospective Native American tour guides

name: Native West Trading Company
